text: ¡Amigos X Siempre! is a soundtrack for the Mexican television series ¡Amigos X Siempre! ("Friends 4 Ever"), it was released in Mexico by Sony BMG. == Information == The CD contains the music from the series performed for the cast, including Belinda, Martín Ricca, Ernesto Laguardia, Adriana Fonceca and the "Amigos X Siempre": Ronald, Oscar, Daniela, Naidelyn, Christopher, Griselle Margarita and Mickey.
